alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats; Middle Tanana Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 6:56PM AKDT until July 24 at 7:30PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Deltana and Tanana Flats in Alaska... South central Middle Tanana Valley in Alaska... * Until 730 PM AKDT. * At 656 PM AKDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Eielson AFB, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Eielson AFB and Moose Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Deltana and Tanana Flats; Middle Tanana Valley
